doc.previous: Charleston has a vibrant theater scene and is home to America s first theater In 2010 Charleston was listed as one of the country s top 10 cities for theater and one of the top two in the South 44 Most of the theaters are part of the League of Charleston Theatres better known as Theatre Charleston 11 Some of the city s theaters include
doc.after: Charleston has many historic buildings art and historical museums and other attractions including
